message: Let's be fair and split the money, Bob. This offer will still be good for you next round.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation hits me harder.
The inflation is hurting us both, Bob. I'm willing to be more generous this time, but we need to settle this before it gets worse.
Inflation is indeed getting worse, and I'm the one losing more value each round. I need a better deal to compensate for that.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We both lose if we drag this out.  Take this offer and we both get something!
